ISSUE.TITLE: This APK cannot be installed. Is this APK compatible the Android VM/Emulator?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ``` OS and Version: win 10 Python Version: 3.8 MobSF Version: 3.1.1 beta ``` **This APK cannot be installed. Is this APK compatible the Android VM/Emulator?** ``` The Dynamic analysis was working fine till I updated to 3.1.1 beta ## STEPS TO REPRODUCE THE ISSUE ``` 1. Upload APK 2. Start dynamic analysis 3. Error : This APK cannot be installed. Is this APK compatible the Android VM/Emulator? ``` ## LOG FILE ``` [WARNING] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:29 - Using Fake XML to continue the Analysis [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:30 - Fetching icon path [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:31 - Extracting Manifest Data [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:31 - Fetching Details from Play Store: Failed [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:31 - Manifest Analysis Started [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:31 - Static Android Binary Analysis Started [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:31 - Static Android Resource Analysis Started [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:31 - Reading Code Signing Certificate [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:31 - Running APKiD 2.1.0 [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:34 - Trackers Database is up-to-date [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:34 - Detecting Trackers [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:36 - APK -> JAVA [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:39:36 - Decompiling to Java with jadx [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:05 - DEX -> SMALI [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:05 - Converting classes.dex to Smali Code [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:05 - Converting classes2.dex to Smali Code [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:05 - Static Android Code Analysis Started [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:05 - Code Analysis Started on - java_source [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:41 - Finished Code Analysis, Email and URL Extraction [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:41 - Extracting Strings from APK [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:42 - Detecting Firebase URL(s) [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:44 - Performing Malware Check on extracted Domains [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:50 - Malware Database is up-to-date [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:51 - Connecting to Database [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:40:51 - Saving to Database [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:41:40 - Creating Dynamic Analysis Environment [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:41:45 - ADB Restarted [INFO] 06/Aug/2020 20:41:45 - Waiting for 2 seconds... [ERROR] 06/Aug/2020 20:41:59 - Internal Server Error: /android_dynamic/``` <!-- BEFORE POSTING YOUR ISSUE/BUG - These comments won't show up when you submit the issue. - GitHub issues ARE NOT FOR FEATURE REQUESTS, SUPPORT, DISCUSSIONS AND QUESTIONS! - If you have questions, use our slack channel. Join MobSF Slack channel: http://tiny.cc/mobsf - Reproduce issue in the latest master and try to add as much detail as possible. - Search this repository (top of the page) for the issue and it has not been fixed or reported already. - Once you open a bug, you should also provide additional information if requested. - Failure to do so in 25 days will result in closure of the bug without further communication. -->

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Scheduled daily dependency update on Wednesday (#1501) * Update frida from 12.11.6 to 12.11.7 * frida binary update * bump env Co-authored-by: Ajin Abraham <ajin25@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Hotfix: Windows DM Install Verify and Android 10 Support (#1503) Fixes a bug #1502 in Windows on Dynamic Analysis APK install verification Added Support for Android 10 API 29 for Genymotion
